= How to use =

See example here: hhttp://www.wiquery.org/wiquery-examples-1.0/?wicket:bookmarkablePage=:org.odlabs.wiquery.examples.datepicker.DatePickerPage

== XHTML ==

{{{
<input type="text" wicket:id="datePicker" />
}}}

== Java ==

{{{
DatePicker<Date> datePicker = new DatePicker<Date>("datePicker");
datePanel.add(datePicker);
}}}
